Exclusive Look: Sneak Peek into Odell Beckham Jr.'s Astonishing $3 Million Watch Collection

Entertainment Dua Lipa · 17/08/2023

﻿﻿﻿

Odell Beckham Jr. is an eccentric former NFL WR who is currently a free agent. The former Rams WR has always been known for his insane style and superb watch and car collection.

The WR has had a great journey in the NFL and has also won the Super Bowl. This makes him one of the best WRs in the league, and with great skills comes great money. That’s the rule followed by the league and OBJ has benefited greatly from it.

Odell’s eccentric lifestyle can put many NFL athletes to shame. However, it’s his watch collection that truly shines. The former Browns WR owns watches that cost more than most people’s life savings.

The 30-year-old WR is known for his splashy lifestyle and often wears watches worth over $1 million dollars for just practice. Here, we take a look at the insane watch collection of Odell Beckham Jr. worth over $3 million.

The exact number of watches in Odell Beckham Jr‘s closet is still unknown as the number keeps increasing from time to time. However, there are some notable pieces that catch the eyes of the beholder due to their flashy features and massive price tag.

When Odell Beckham Jr. gave his debut with the Browns, he decided to make a statement and that statement was the Richard Mille RM – 1103 that he wore during the game against the Tennessee Titans. The watch is from an exclusive McLaren collection by Richard Mille and costs upwards of $350,000

Odell decided to take things up a notch after wearing the Richard Mille McLaren addition. This time the WR thought about wearing a watch that costs more than most people’s houses and life earnings.

The WR wore the Richard Mille RM – 56-02 that costs upwards of $2 million. That is an insane amount of money for a watch. The watch had sapphires embedded in it and took almost 960 hours to complete. Only 10 watches were made and OBJ has one of them.

Rolex is a luxury watch brand that is known for its richness and style. Therefore, it was quite obvious when Odell set his sights on the luxury watch. However, the former WR chooses one of the most premium Rolex watches to add to his collection, the Rolex GMT Master II.

The watch is a highly advanced timepiece that oozes status and symbol. OBJ has been seen wearing the watch during formal events like award functions.
